experience.title: Research Assistant
achievements: Design an algorithm to fit dark matter N-body simulation data to ellipsoidal halos.
Obtain half mass radii to improve upon the Navarro–Frenk–White (NFW) profile.
Incorporate existing code for reading simulation data into a modular and scalable Python class for use in further research.

experience.title: Team Leader
experience.workplace: Vanderbilt School of Engineering - Senior Design
achievements: Develop digital signal processing module in python using GNURadio for RTL software defined radios.
Design a satellite tracking antenna using servo motors and 3D printed components.
Program an open source real-time trajectory visualization and motor control interface in D3.js, Python, and C via a browser, local server, and Arduino Uno board.

projects.title: SatTrack
projects.description: A simple, easy to use library for visualizing satellite paths, predicting future passes, and tracking satellite trakectories using servo motors. Developed for Institute for Space and Defense Electronics - Software Defined Radio (ISDE-SDR) project at Vanderbilt.
